com.schematron.ant
Class Validator

java.lang.Object
  com.schematron.ant.Validator

public final class Validator
extends Object

An object representing a single Schematron schema, used to validate multiple XML instances.

Version:
14 February 2010
Author:
Christophe Lauret, Willy Ekasalim, Rick Jelliffe

Method Detail

validate

public SchematronResult validate(Source xml,
                                 String fnp,
                                 String fdp,
                                 String anp,
                                 String adp,
                                 String encoding)
                          throws TransformerConfigurationException,
                                 TransformerException
Performs validation of the passed XML data.

Parameters:
xml - The XML data to be validated.
fnp - the file name if available separately
fdp - the file directory path or the whole system identifier otherwise ?@?param report The Schematron report collecting results for each file.
Throws:
TransformerConfigurationException - Should an error occur while instantiating a transformer.
TransformerException - If an error occurs while performing the transformation.
